entry.title: Polaris
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,331Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 8

Summary: Dick drags Jason three hours into the wilderness for what should be a simple camping tripâ€”just two people looking at stars far from Gotham's smog. But under the vast night sky, away from the noise and expectations that usually define them, something shifts. Jason's walls start to crack, and Dick finally finds the courage to say what he's been holding back.
